    • 方法详细资料

      • net2Java

        public static java.lang.String net2Java(java.lang.String sql)

      • pagingQuerySql

        public static java.lang.String pagingQuerySql(java.lang.String sql,
                                              DatabaseCategory dbType,
                                              CurrentLanguage lang)
                                       throws java.lang.Exception
        Re-build the query SQL to implement paging function. The new SQL Statement will contains limit if the database type is MYSQL, CET wrapped if database type is SQL Server. Note: the final SQL will contain two %s, which should be replaced in run time.
        参数:
        sql - The original SQL Statement
        dbType - The database type
        返回:
        Re-build SQL which contains limit if the database type is MYSQL, CET wrapped if database type is SQL Server.
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception

      • rebuildJavaInClauseSQL

        public static void rebuildJavaInClauseSQL(java.lang.String sql,
                                          java.util.List<JavaParameterHost> parameters)
                                   throws java.lang.Exception
        抛出:
        java.lang.Exception
